reasoning: Adult-specific DLBCL represents majority of DLBCL cases (median age 60-70 years). Incidence ~4.5 per 100k adults, slightly higher than general population estimate since pediatric DLBCL is rare.
source: Morton LM et al. (2006). Lymphoma incidence patterns by WHO subtype in the United States, 1992-2001. Blood. 107(1):265-276
